title: TAO outlook: can the token stabilise after the latest selloff?
description: Crypto TAO has been under notable pressure recently, and traders are now asking whether this heavy downswing is close to exhaustion or just pausing before another leg lower. In this piece we explore where the asset stands technically, how broader crypto conditions are shaping sentiment, and what that may mean for the next directional move. […]

title: Aave introduces mobile savings app with 9% interest and insurance protection
description: The mobile application aims to compete with banks and leading fintech firms. Users will earn up to 9% annual interest with insurance protection on deposits of up to $1 million. Individuals can use stablecoins, bank accounts, or debit cards to fund accounts and enjoy 24/7 interest
content: Aave introduces mobile savings app with 9% interest and insurance protectionThe mobile application aims to compete with banks and leading fintech firms. Users will earn up to 9% annual interest with insurance protection on deposits of up to $1 million. Individuals can use stablecoins, bank accounts, or debit cards to fund accounts and enjoy 24/7 interest

title: Why Ethereum’s current 35% whale sell-off may be its most bullish signal
description: Ethereum is undergoing its most significant transition since its August peak. A sharp, double-digit correction of more than 35% since Oct. 6 has triggered a crisis of conviction, ripping through the speculative layers of the market and forcing a wave of liquidations. However, the on-chain story is not a simple collapse
content: Why Ethereum’s current 35% whale sell-off may be its most bullish signalEthereum is undergoing its most significant transition since its August peak. A sharp, double-digit correction of more than 35% since Oct. 6 has triggered a crisis of conviction, ripping through the speculative layers of the market and forcing a wave of liquidations. However, the on-chain story is not a simple collapse

title: Think BlackRock Is Bullish on Bitcoin? Arthur Hayes Says They’re Not, Here’s Why
description: Institutional inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs have been one of the biggest storylines since their launch last year. With Bitcoin hitting new highs in 2025 and ETF assets surging, many assume big Wall Street players are finally “long Bitcoin. ” But not so fast, says Arthur Hayes. In an email sent Monday, the BitMEX co-founder argues that much of the institutional activity inside BlackRock’s IBIT, still the largest Bitcoin ETF by assets, has nothing to do with long-term conviction
content: Think BlackRock Is Bullish on Bitcoin? Arthur Hayes Says They’re Not, Here’s WhyInstitutional inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs have been one of the biggest storylines since their launch last year. With Bitcoin hitting new highs in 2025 and ETF assets surging, many assume big Wall Street players are finally “long Bitcoin. ” But not so fast, says Arthur Hayes. In an email sent Monday, the BitMEX co-founder argues that much of the institutional activity inside BlackRock’s IBIT, still the largest Bitcoin ETF by assets, has nothing to do with long-term conviction

title: CBOE Futures Exchange to launch perpetual BTC and ETH contracts in December
description: CBOE will expand its futures market to offer regulated perpetual-style contracts. The CFTC-regulated trading will tap general interest in perpetual futures trading. CBOE’s Bitcoin and Ether Continuous Futures will be open to US traders, offering perpetual-style exposure. The trading is fully regulated by the CFTC, and will be open 23 hours per day, five days […]

title: Ethereum Price: Whales Step In Amid Heavy ETF Outflow, What’s Next?
description: Key Insights: Over the past week, the Ethereum Price came under pressure as ETH markets digested heavy selling and declining demand. The US Spot Ethereum ETF recorded outflows, long-term holders realized gains, and chart signals pointed to a weaker trend.
content: Ethereum Price: Whales Step In Amid Heavy ETF Outflow, What’s Next?Key Insights: Over the past week, the Ethereum Price came under pressure as ETH markets digested heavy selling and declining demand. The US Spot Ethereum ETF recorded outflows, long-term holders realized gains, and chart signals pointed to a weaker trend.
